name: Modify Attachment Manager Settings - Attachments
description: Detects tampering with attachment manager settings policies attachments (See reference for more information)
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\.*/) AND ((registry.path:/.*\\[Hh][Ii][Dd][Ee][Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Tt][Ii][Ee][Ss]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/) OR (registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Aa][Vv][Ee][Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000002\)/) OR (registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Ww][Ii][Tt][Hh][Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\Attachments\\*) AND ((registry.path:*\\HideZoneInfoOnProperties AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)) OR (registry.path:*\\SaveZoneInformation AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000002\)) OR (registry.path:*\\ScanWithAntiVirus AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000001\))))`
